google_reviews.author: Azariah Reis
google_reviews.review: I am still in the process of working with PURE Property Management, so far I have been very impressed with the communication and willingness to work with me. Rose has been very supportive and informative in my application process which is something that I can truly appreciate. I hope to have PURE Property Management as my next property management!

google_reviews.author: Stacey Salyer
google_reviews.review: We love working with Barbara and the entire PURE team.  As a vendor, working with PURE is super easy.  Their Property Meld system is wonderful and makes communicating with the residents extremely easy.  Everyone at PURE has been great to work with and very friendly.  Our plumbing company works with a lot of customers but PURE is definitely one of our favorites.

google_reviews.author: Athena Marsden
google_reviews.review: I recently signed a lease and found my leasing specialist Rose to be very helpful and quick to respond to my questions. I have enjoyed the prompt communication experience and a smooth transition into my new home.

google_reviews.author: Jenni Dean
google_reviews.review: Since 2019, I've enjoyed renting from PURE Property  Management.  I am greatful for their patient, kind, and knowledgeable service. Having their efficient apps make payments and document signing a breeze. With only one maintenance request needed, they demonstrated their professionalism by completing it quickly and efficiently. Thanks Karen Gaxiola for all your assistance.

google_reviews.author: A. Middleton
google_reviews.review: I'm in the process of working to rent a studio from PURE and the leasing agent, Rose, has been very helpful in getting everything moving in a positive direction.  Hoping to be a tenant of theirs soon!

google_reviews.author: Gregory Macdonald
google_reviews.review: On Tuesday April 9, I reported a couple of maintenance issues at my apartment to Karen Gaxiola, who is the maintenance coordinator for Pure Property Management. And on Wednesday, April 10, Jeff, the owner of the apartment building showed up and made the necessary repairs and adjustments. So I'm thanking Karen for her prompt attention to my maintenance requests.

google_reviews.author: Linda Riordan
google_reviews.review:
Terrible property company maybe even worse than Hammer Properties! If I could give 0 stars I would.

First, they let a roommate not pay rent and did't even try to contact the cosigner to make them pay. They could have taken money out of the security deposit but no they made my daughter and her roommates pay for the 4th person when they suddenly moved out. They gave no leniency and just made the people staying in the house figure it out. The person at the front desk (Amber Terry) said "That's not our problem." How unprofessional and Pure was never helpful.

Second, Rebeka Chadwell let squatters live in the house for 5 months and did not do anything when she was notified. This was very unsafe and these squatters made copies of the house keys and could have given them out to anyone. Anyone could have gotten into the house and that could have been a bad situation.

TLDR: Pure property allows squatters to live in the apartments/houses and offer no help when they are asked.

google_reviews.author: Tru Aging Solutions Marketing
google_reviews.review: My hot water quit working on Sunday. I was appreciative of the timely response end of the recognition of my experience in the h vac industry. As to the recommendations to replace the water heater. It was done quickly and efficiently and timely.

google_reviews.author: Jacob Del Savio
google_reviews.review: Rebekah was a great contact during our time of renting with SonRise/Pure. We always had prompt servicing for anything that occurred at the property, great communication, and fantastic flexibility. I would recommend the SonRise/Pure team to anyone looking for a rental in Bellingham.

google_reviews.author: Cassey Holmgren
google_reviews.review: Zerick is absolutely incredible to work with! Took my issue seriously and it was resolved extremely quickly. I cannot say enough about how wonderful he was to work with and how much I appreciate him!!

google_reviews.author: River Kley
google_reviews.review: I appreciate the timely and efficient work order process! The manager, Barbara Flores Reta made the process of getting my dryer fixed quick and easy and allowed me to resume laundry in no time! Thank you to the Pure Property Management for resolving my issues so quickly!

google_reviews.author: Chase Ebrite
google_reviews.review: Worked with Rose to find a place and everything was smooth! Thank you so much! We love the new apartment!

google_reviews.author: Jacob Jacob
google_reviews.review: Rose saved me during a most difficult time.  She was responsive, professional and went well beyond what she was probably expected to do.  Ill always remember Rose.  She was a blossom for me!  Thank you so much Rose!

google_reviews.author: Connor Hieb
google_reviews.review: Rose was very helpful and provided me with the proper information to attain my new apartment and helped me through the whole process

google_reviews.author: Larry Lindborg
google_reviews.review: I want to compliment Barbara on her great help with my rental maintenance in Ferndale  she was very attentive responsive  informative and prompt  it was nice working with someone that is professional and personal  so many businesses are not  but she should be commended for her diligence and representing your company the way she does  thank you

google_reviews.author: Tabitha Cox
google_reviews.review: Son-Rise has been flexible, easy to work with, and understanding. We just signed our third lease with them, and though we've only paid rent late once, they were understanding and empathetic during that hard time. They have a very balanced approach to management  they're not overly invasive, but do keep up with the property, always with notice. Their monthly rent is reasonable in the current economic climate (any time I've seen a property on CL, rent with SR has been lower than other similar homes in the area), and they haven't hiked rent on us. They're great at communicating when inspections will be or when anything important comes up, and they've been great about responding to maintenance requests when needed. Son-Rise has been the best property management company I've ever rented with and I'm glad to continue renting with them.

ownerResponse.text:
Dear Tabitha,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive experience with Son-Rise Property Management. We are delighted to hear that you find our management style balanced and appreciate our communication efforts. It's wonderful to know that you have found our rental rates reasonable and that we have been responsive to your maintenance requests. We value you as a tenant and look forward to continuing our relationship.

Best regards,

Son-Rise Property Management, Inc.

google_reviews.author: Space Cowboy
google_reviews.review: One of the worse companies Ive ever had the displeasure to be involved with. Taking over from the last company, they have done the impressive task of making Son-Rise a proactive business. Issues ranging from toilet not flushing, constant leaking with freezer and fridge and a washer and dryer who would simply not work. I would not recommend a single person to live in anything with the this company, as it is clear they only care to help when the issue may reflect poorly on them. Pathetic excuse for customer service when you reach to the help line, get did you plunge the toilet while getting no form of communication for days.

google_reviews.author: Nora Ledesma
google_reviews.review: Karen Gaxiola assisted in setting up a visit to have my electricity fixed. Very prompt which was much appreciated.

google_reviews.author: Darren Bell
google_reviews.review:
Very responsive and professional. Barbara Reta was a pleasure to work with when we were sorting things out.
Very impressive. I would highly recommend this service

google_reviews.author: Joy Elsner
google_reviews.review: I had an electrical outlet short out and Karen Gaxiola took great care to get someone out promptly to fix it.  Thank you Karen.

google_reviews.author: S B
google_reviews.review: So far so good! The staff have been very helpful with the securing the rental and communicative during the whole process.

google_reviews.author: Michael Shores
google_reviews.review: Zerick was awesome, he is very knowledgeable about the business and very helpful and considerate.

google_reviews.author: chris matson
google_reviews.review: It was great when it was sunrise property Management but now that it's pure I pay 45 bucks a month fee for absolutely nothing

google_reviews.author: Aaron Schardein
google_reviews.review: Why would you have showings with boxes you don't have access to now I wasted an hour of my time and there is no solution till Monday maybe only allow showing when someone on staff can oversee operations machines can only do so much.

google_reviews.author: lisa r
google_reviews.review: From the moment we entered the Son-Rise office in July 2022, we had excellent service. They were easy to work with during the application process and available to answer all our questions and concerns.  Last week there was an issue with the water heater, the service request and photos were submitted and a new water heater was installed within 2 days. Keep up the good work and thank you for being so responsive.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Lisa:  Wow! Thank you for giving us a 5-star review. We appreciate your time and effort in letting us know that you are happy with our service. All the best, Son-Rise Property Management

google_reviews.author: lisa turner
google_reviews.review: Karen Gaxiola was very helpful in having an issue with our home fixed very quickly.

google_reviews.author: Gina Aiello
google_reviews.review: Maintenance issues resolved quickly. Barbara Flores Reta was a pleasure to work with, professional and timely.

google_reviews.author: erich cosgrove
google_reviews.review: Team is very pleasant to work with and always quick to respond to our requests.  They treat our property as if it were their own, as well as take care of all tenant issues with efficiency and pride.  Excellent management company.  Would recommend to any property owner.

ownerResponse.text: Hello Erich: Thank you very much for the 5* review!  We really appreciate owners like you who are prompt in responding to tenant issues. All the best, Son-Rise Property Management

google_reviews.author: Thomas Mordal
google_reviews.review: Karen Gaxiola did us good and freezer working

google_reviews.author: mike blaney
google_reviews.review: Barbara is great at communicating and assisting in processing work orders quickly

google_reviews.author: Adam Mcgary
google_reviews.review: Kandis, with Son Rise has been very helpful with our transition from one rental we've had for years to the next, that is about to be our place!  She worked with us, which we really appreciate.  Knowing it's a hard time of year to move, they worked with us through every step.  Everyone in the office has always been very friendly as well!  Good company in my opinion!  Thanks, Adam and Shandra.

ownerResponse.text: Hello Adam and Shandra: Thank you for taking the time to send us a 4-star review!  We really appreciate your feedback and look forward to working with you in the coming years.  All the best, Son-Rise Property Management

google_reviews.author: Rick Blair
google_reviews.review: Great service, work with Barbara Flores regularly and she gets work orders approved and the job complete!

google_reviews.author: Paul Backus
google_reviews.review:
This was the third management company for my apartment after the property sold, so my experience doesn't encompass beginning or ending a lease with them yet.

They never bothered me too much, though. I paid rent on time, occasionally a few days late but never had problems with fees. They weren't very good about posting access days during remodeling under the new owner, and occasionally had trouble keeping the washer/dryer running. They did refund me the quarters I lost in the machine though, and even gave me an extra one for the trouble. Delivered right to my door, too. :)

They were totally on board with a month-to-month arrangement after the lease expired recently, which is great while I search for a job and figure out where I'm moving to.

Can't say too much about them other than that they never bothered me much, but I'm a pretty good tenant, generally. Like most Bellingham managers, there's always someone else to fill the apartment so you don't have a lot of leverage.

Hopefully there won't be any issues with the deposit when I leave.

ownerResponse.text: While we are thankful for your feedback, we would like to learn more about why your experience was not an exceptional one. Reach out to us at (360) 738-3700 to let us know how we can improve for your next visit.

google_reviews.author: Ashley Zalucha
google_reviews.review: I spoke with Jennifer with Son-rise earlier today and I greatly appreciated her time and assistance. She was kind, professional, and extremely helpful as she went above and beyond to help answer my questions. While I unfortunately will most likely not be renting from Son-rise as I was slow to get my application in. They will be the 1st property management company I'll look to rent from should I ever need a new rental in the future.

ownerResponse.text: Hello Jennifer! Thank you for your 5 star review.  We really appreciate your feedback and agree that Jennifer provides awesome customer service.  She certainly does go "above and beyond"!  All the best, Son-Rise Property Management

google_reviews.author: Lynn Kalsbeek
google_reviews.review:
Son-Rise has been providing property management services for me for the past 6 years. They make it easy to own a rental property as they take care of finding and screening tenants, scheduling maintenance and looking after repairs and emergencies. Taryn has been our property manager for the past year and she has very capably dealt with moveouts, move-ins, repairs and anything else that comes her way! She is always easy to reach and responds promptly to any questions that I may have.
I would highly recommend Son-Rise to anyone looking for a quality property management company!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you, Lynn. We appreciate you taking the time to leave your kind review of Son-Rise Property Management, Inc... We look forward to taking care of your needs in the future. Have a wonderful day!

google_reviews.author: javier felix
google_reviews.review: Submitted application for Rental property, 2 weeks later told property already has approval application. My application was never looked at, now they wont refund fee. Scammers,  dont apply! Asked to created pet profile for another $25

google_reviews.author: Amber Suedekum
google_reviews.review: Have been renting from them for a little over 2 years now and they have been nothing but awesome. Whenever we go in to pay rent and the kiddos come with us inside, everyone is so nice to them, even if they are doing something else, they are respectful to me and my kids. I absolutely love our property manager, Sandy and am glad we came to find this awesome property management company.

ownerResponse.text: Hello Amber, thank you for your kind review! Whenever your family comes in to Son-Rise you always put a smile on our faces.

google_reviews.author: Cheri Beri
google_reviews.review: Ive been with son-rise for a long time and as a responsible tenant, I have nothing but good things to say about them. They have been responsive and handled every need right away. They are fair and understand special circumstances. You have to let them know, or they cant help, but every time Ive contacted them, they have someone on the job immediately. They are fair and will work with people.  I would recommend them anytime!!!

ownerResponse.text: Hey there! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We truly appreciate any comments we receive as it's a great way to gain unbiased insight on how we're doing. It's fantastic to know that you had a positive experience and we hope to see you again soon at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc..

google_reviews.author: Nicole Jackson
google_reviews.review: I have had the BEST experience so far with Son-Rise. I had spent hundreds of dollars on applying for apartments through other Property Management companies (even signed a lease and paid a deposit but was taken off of the lease without my knowledge) and was getting very frustrated. I found an adorable little apartment on their web site and contacted them via their web form, not expecting much. I was contacted for a viewing appointment RIGHT AWAY and when I viewed the apartment, was told that I might not make enough money to afford the apartment. Disheartened, I went to their office anyhow to apply. The Property Manager told me that I did make enough and I should apply right away. Much to my surprise and joy, I found out that they ONLY ACCEPT ONE APPLICATION AT A TIME!! So since I had applied, they wouldn't even SHOW the apartment to anyone else!! I was ecstatic. They told me that I wouldn't find out for a week due to the onslaught of applications they had. I needed to move in by the following weekend and was incredibly stressed. But they called me RIGHT AWAY and said that I had gotten the apartment, and I could sign the lease the following business day! I signed the lease, got my keys, easy as that! Now, if that wasn't enough for me to love them--after I moved in, I realized that the lock on the door wasn't enough for me to feel secure. (Just a deadbolt, no other locking mechanism). I emailed my property manager and she had a chain lock installed THE NEXT DAY. On top of THAT, the vertical slatted blinds were old and falling down when I moved in. I didn't notice until the week after, when two of them broke off. I put in a maintenance request through their web site on Thursday, not expecting them to care or fix it. I was planning on fixing them myself after the weekend if I didn't hear from them. The office called me on Friday and said that they would take a look and fix it as soon as possible, but they had so many requests in that it probably wouldn't be for two weeks. I told her that sooner rather than later would be amazing because people could see into my apartment, and she said she would do her best. I went away for the weekend and came home on Sunday to find the ENTIRE thing replaced!!! Needless to say, I have been respected, treated kindly, and overall overjoyed to be renting from Son-Rise.

ownerResponse.text: Hello Nicole. Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback! Our team at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc. always strives for the highest standards. We are delighted we made your experience a positive one. Until next time, take care.

google_reviews.author: Julie Oldham
google_reviews.review: Service was excellent. Response time was very good. The job got quickly was very satisfied  the service.

google_reviews.author: Whitney
google_reviews.review:
Janet went out of her way for a lot of things.  Because we spent 15 hours cleaning, we received our deposit back.

Based upon that, I would give Son-Rise 4 stars.

However, there is a young girl working as a receptionist that I would solely give less than one star.  When we handed in our deposit and gave them the date we would be moving in, she said she would write it on the calendar and that were all set to move in on that day.  We showed up on that day and apparently she didn't write it in and played it off like we never told her the day.  We had all the people ready to help us move and a moving truck already rented and we were told we had to wait the next day.  I had to make it clear that was impossible since everyone worked the next day.  We had to wait for the lease to be prepared and someone to inspect the apartment.

Anytime I had to speak to her on the phone, she was beyond disrespectful over simple questions and gave me incorrect information constantly.

I do not understand how she wasn't fired for the first problem.  I really wish she didn't work there, because all of my frustrations have arised from dealing with her incompetence.

ownerResponse.text: Hello there, Whitney. Our customers are very important to us and we are sorry to hear about this experience. Let us know more about what happened and how we can remedy that for you. Please call our office at (360)738-3700 when you're able. Thank you.

google_reviews.author: Isabella Laumer
google_reviews.review: HR Very judgmental before they even meet you..

google_reviews.author: jake schmitt
google_reviews.review: They don't give any care for their tenants and only care about the money they make. You'll never get your full deposit back and just throw random charges on there. ( Ie. Cleaning all day to make it spotless and have a charge for 199 for cleaning) maintenance response is crazy. Fixed stuff going on and said they would come back later and 2 years later moving out it's still not done. I would advise to stay clear of any property managed by Sonrise or expect a loss in all fronts due to selfishness.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for taking the time to voice your concerns. Please reach out to us at (360) 738-3700 to further discuss your concerns. Thank you and we hope to hear from you promptly.

google_reviews.author: Adrienne Manwaring
google_reviews.review: I have had nothing but positive experiences with Son-Rise. The leasing agent who handles the property I'm in is very responsive and typically gets things in my condo fixed within a couple of days. She is very professional and treats me with respect.  I am a very happy "customer".

ownerResponse.text: Hey there, Adrienne! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We truly appreciate any comments we receive as it's a great way to gain unbiased insight on how we're doing. It's fantastic to know that you had a positive experience and we hope to see you again soon at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc..

google_reviews.author: Helen Schoenfeld
google_reviews.review: I've managed my own rentals in the past, and it's always been time-consuming and stressful. When I needed to rent this property I contacted Son-Rise on the advise of a friend, and I couldn't be more satisfied. When I first listed it, the owner (Joan), came to the house with me and advised me on improvements to make (fresh paint, carpet, etc.).  It rented in a timely fashion even though the market was not great, and I got a fabulous tenant who has been there ever since.  During this time every issue that either I or my tenant had was addressed very promptly. I have been advised of every repair needed, but they handle it all.  I would heartily recommend them to anyone, and will use them again if I have any more rentals.

google_reviews.author: Colter Bolaski
google_reviews.review: I have had many interactions with this company both on a personal level and a professional level. This company is by far one of the most sued property management companies in the county. They rip off their tenants with high prices, lack of intent to fix basic living necessities that arise in units, coverup piss units by peeling back the carpet and painting under the corners instead of removing the carpets and the list goes on. They treat their vendors who do work on the units as if they are slaves. I know of one particular lady who has been there a while that might do the company a favor if she moves on.

ownerResponse.text: While we are thankful for your feedback, we would like to learn more about why your experience was not an exceptional one. Reach out to us at (360) 738-3700 to let us know how we can improve for your next visit.

google_reviews.author: Travis Shaflik
google_reviews.review:
Pros: Apps were quick and good with maintenance
Cons: Don't expect your deposits back. They took 400$ alone for cleaning (separate from carpet cleaning) after we spent 2 weekends doing everything on a checklist that they gave us and leaving the house cleaner than when we moved in.

Not renting through Son-Rise again, paid 13 months worth of rent for a 12 month lease.

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Travis,
Thank you for your review. We want to be sure that your account is correct, and any charges are without error.  If you have any questions regarding this, please contact our office.

google_reviews.author: Bao Chau Tran
google_reviews.review: I have been renting here for one year and I loved it so far. The initial application process was very quick (one week top I think). The manager and their staff really care about our needs and are very understanding. Maintenance is very quick to response to calls and everything was great. Rent is reasonable, the free heat is great in the winter. I really recommend this group!

google_reviews.author: Nicholas Pickard
google_reviews.review: These property managers do not care for their tenants. They did not inform me of mold issues before I moved in, I reported mold issues many times after this. Mold built up in the bedroom closet and window sill, ruining some of my cloths. One of their workers told me they would have to tear down the wall and repair it because the mold was in the wall. I did not want to be put up in a hotel until they fixed it, so I moved out. They then denied I ever reported mold issues after I moved out and charged me for cleaning the mold...

ownerResponse.text:
Dear Nicholas: Thank you for taking the time to let us know your concerns.  Our files indicate that there no mold found during your move out process nor were you assessed any clean up charges for mold.  Please call our office if you would like to discuss this further.
Thank you, Son-Rise Property Management

google_reviews.author: Derek Worchel
google_reviews.review: Son Rise Property Management is an incredible company comprised of caring, considerate, and professional property managers and staff. I highly recommend working with them when your real estate asset needs professional management. I have worked with most property management companies in town, but only Son Rise has the outstanding caliber of character and knowledge that landlords and condo associations need to manage their assets. Over the past 5 years, I have worked with Son Rise's condo and residential divisions and have been impressed with the level of dedication, attention, and care that EVERY SINGLE property receives from this well run organization!

ownerResponse.text: That is so amazing to hear, Derek! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with our team at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc.. It's great to know that we continue to provide our customers with everything they need. Have a great day!

google_reviews.author: Taylor Trettevik
google_reviews.review:
I'm tempted to join the board of my condo association with the express concern being to find new property management. The reception is rude 90% of the time. There is only one person in the whole office that can do anything associated with our building. If she is unavailable there is noone capable of handling any concern.

I have multiple stories about how completely illogical they are about handling issues. The latest being a lockbox I had attached to the front gate that was suddenly missing one day. I was first told by the Keystone contact that Son-rise knew nothing about it. The next day I was told by the same person that they had previously tried to contact the owners of the boxes, but they weren't sure who some of them belonged to. It's pretty logical that they belonged to owners/tenants in the building. It also seems like it should be pretty easy to send a group email/contact the owners.

ownerResponse.text: We appreciate you taking the time to leave your feedback. We're sorry we didn't provide you with the best experience that we could have. Please reach out to us at (360) 738-3700 to let us know how we can improve.

google_reviews.author: Soheyl Ghiami
google_reviews.review:
This is how I felt ripped off with Son-Rise:
The time we entered the apartment, carpets were full of stains, spots and holes as well as the walls.
(The rent was $795 and the apartment was 650 sqf)
After SIX moths when we moved out, they charged us $407 for Carpet cleaning + Cleaning!!!
I swear that we left the apartment as clean as when we moved in. Not even a single pin hole was added to the walls and we had someone clean the apt entirely before we left which cost us $100. (They had suggested if we leave it cleaned, they won't charge us for cleaning and they will only charge us for the cleaning which is $85).
The next person who moved into that apt after us was our friend. It was a shocking news to me that he got the apt with the same stains, spots and holes on carpets and walls!!!!!!!
Well done Son-Rise. You charged me $407 as cleaning fee for a six-month stay in a 650 sqf apartment, even though I left it as clean as it was when I moved in.

ownerResponse.text: We're sorry to hear that you didn't have a great experience. Please call us at (360) 738-3700 to let us know more.

google_reviews.author: Alison Roll
google_reviews.review:
My father in-law was just injured due to son rise refusing to move a vehicle blocking safe and reasonable access to his unit. This vehicle came from another building and street, yet they refused.
I feel he's being harassed because he's an old white male and a disabled veteran. They raised his rent $1200/month, fix almost nothing, and ignore his requests.

ownerResponse.text: Our team wants to extend our sincerest apologies concerning the issues that you have faced. We pride ourselves on maintaining the highest quality standards for our customers we hope you will give us an opportunity to discuss your concerns further with you. You can reach out to us at (360) 738-3700. We hope to find a solution promptly.

google_reviews.author: Grant Rich
google_reviews.review:
We have been renting with Son Rise for a year in a 650 sq ft apartment. We always paid our rent on time, never smoked or had pets or had any strange drug party's like just about everyone else in the surrounding areas did.

Anyways we left the apartment two weeks ago, even handed out keys in a week early to give them time to prep for new tenants.

We spent 4 hours cleaning the day before  we handed the keys in. Not only that we fixed several broken lights, a broken closet door, a stain on the ceiling and the base board heaters (there where all things that where broken when we moved in) We scrubbed the already clean appartment.

Our deposit was $895 today we recieved $325.

If a cleaning company is taking 8 hours to clean a 650 sq ft apartment then they need to get some new management and new staff that's just insane.

We are now happy home owners but would like to share this terrible experience with Son Rise in Bellingham and highly reccomend avoiding them if possible.

ownerResponse.text: Hello Grant. Thank you for your feedback. We aim to provide an exceptional experience for all of our customers and would be glad to discuss this further offline. Please reach out to us at (360) 738-3700 to let us know how we can do better.

google_reviews.author: T Nicole
google_reviews.review: Rented through them for almost three years with no problems. They are quick to fix issues and since we didn't do any damage and left the place clean, we got our full deposit back. Only problem was them raising the rent really high, but that's Bellingham for you.

ownerResponse.text: Hello and thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you have nothing but amazing things to say about our team at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc. and what we offer. Thank you and have a wonderful day!

google_reviews.author: Edwina Gomez
google_reviews.review: Do Not Live At Their Properties!! I have lived all around the country and have never had more complications then with Son Rise, they never did half the things that I asked for. Such as fixing a burner on the stove top, even after I showed management when they visited the house. Be careful!!

ownerResponse.text: Good Afternoon Edwina, I am sorry to hear about your unfortunate experience and anyone at our office would be happy to discuss it with you offline. Here at Son-Rise Property Management we really try to make sure that all of our tenants needs are met. We look forward to hearing from you.

google_reviews.author: Evan Rhodes
google_reviews.review: They lied to me about cleaning my unit after handing me the keys. There were disgusting, crusty stains all over the carpet, smoke damage on the walls, and a disgusting smell coming from my bathroom. I even paid for my own carpet cleaner to finish the mandatory task that they failed to achieve.

google_reviews.author: Andrew Liebel
google_reviews.review:
Pretty awful experience.

They towed and impounded my car that was registered on my lease and parked next to my condo. They left a 3 day notice prior to towing, which didn't do me any good because I was out of town. They didnt bother to call or email me, and my car sat in the impound lot for 5 days before I was notified through the mail. It ended up costing me about $700 dollars to park my car in a parking lot I paid for.

Extremely disappointed.

google_reviews.author: Pure 149 Design
google_reviews.review: They manage  my property for 7 years, suddenly they changed the person in charge of my account, and I got a letter saying that I needed to spend $ 6,000.00 in repairs, and had 2 weeks to approved them or they will not represent me anymore. The estimates sent included several items that they had repaired and charge to me before without my approval . My questions about it were ignored, and in the midst of the hurricane Harvey, I live in Houston, they rescinded the contract, . Needles to say, I'm not happy.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for taking the time to voice your concerns. Please reach out to us at (360) 738-3700 to further discuss your concerns. Thank you and we hope to hear from you promptly.

google_reviews.author: Sarrah Saunders
google_reviews.review: Great customer service from Zerick  Shores

google_reviews.author: April Gassman
google_reviews.review: This is a horibble company and the BBB needs to be called. They treated former neighbors horribly. Charged for cleaning that never happened (I live next door I saw how long the cleaners were there) and claimed the house was a mess when I helped clean for hours and the house was spotless when we all left. So barring the house being broken into there is no way that house was a mess at insepection.

ownerResponse.text: Hi there April,  I am sorry that you feel we charged your friend unfairly.  Here at Son-Rise Property Management we outsource our vendors to keep move-out cleaning and repairs as transparent as possible, and only remove what we were charged from the deposit. We would be happy to discuss any disputed charges with your friend or give a more extensive explanation at the office.

google_reviews.author: Jordan
google_reviews.review:
called in and asked for the owner because my uncle is a private investor looking for a prop management company.... the receptionist said "FOR WHAT WE HAVE LOTS OF THEM" with the worse attitude and disrespect you could ever encounter. Her job is to just answer the phone and re direct calls accordingly. If the receptions is a reflection of how the owners act and hire that type of people... who would want to do business with them. NOT US!

i hope she reads this or the owners and checks that funky attitude of hers

UN PROFESSIONAL

google_reviews.author: Lucas Robinson
google_reviews.review: Only rental company I can say I've had all positive experiences with. Extended my lease and cleaned out my new apartment days early so that I wouldn't have to couch surf between. Always nice and honest about expectations

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Lucas,
Thank you so much for your review.  Here at Son-Rise we strive to exceed expectations of our tenants and owners.

google_reviews.author: Ben Thompson
google_reviews.review: Everyone at Son-Rise was very friendly and quick to answer questions. Sandra was especially helpful. Another bonus was the online maintenance requests which had extremely fast response time. Couldn't ask for a better experience.

ownerResponse.text: Hey there, Ben. We're happy to hear you had an awesome time with us at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc.! Thanks for sharing your experience. We hope you stop by and see us again soon.

google_reviews.author: Greg Campbell
google_reviews.review:
Reply to response from the owner:

As a property management group, it would be very simple for you to search your database and find I have lived at Morse Square for over 3 years.

Thank you for further validating this 1 star review.

ownerResponse.text: We greatly appreciate your response; however, we are unable to find a record for you as a past or current tenant or an affiliated vendor. Please contact our office at 360-738-3700 or e-mail us at info@son-rise.net, so we can better understand the situation that caused your unsatisfactory review. Thank you and we look forward to hearing from you!

google_reviews.author: Amanda Burk
google_reviews.review: Submitted an application over 2 weeks ago and so far have not heard back. Called Son-Rise multiple times since then and were told the processing delay was a result of the pandemic and the company being too busy. Given that people have deadlines to move in and out, we found this management company not professional.

ownerResponse.text: Hello Amanda: Thank you for reaching out. We checked our inbox and files and we could not find an application from you.  Please let us know if you submitted an online application through our website.  You may call us at 360-738-3700 or email at info@son-rise.net. All the best, Son-Rise Property Management

google_reviews.author: Adrienne Martin
google_reviews.review: Son-Rise is proof that not all property management companies are terrible! Their office staff are professional and kind, and Kandis was absolutely wonderful to work with.

ownerResponse.text: We're grateful to know that your experience with us was an amazing one, and that Kandis was able to take care of your needs! We're always happy to hear appreciation from our customers. We look forward to seeing you again soon at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc.

google_reviews.author: Taylor Ingram
google_reviews.review: I wish I could give zero stars. Every time I call and politely try to speak to someone, whoever answers is SO incredibly rude. I just moved into an apartment under their management about two months ago and they have made settling in so difficult. I really wish they could be a tad more conscious about how they treat people.

ownerResponse.text: We want to sincerely apologize for your negative experience with us, however, we'd like to learn more about the situation. We want to make things right. Please contact us at (360) 738-3700 and we will get back to you promptly. We look forward to hearing from you.

google_reviews.author: Sarah Mccutchen
google_reviews.review: So Son-rise was on top of every maintenance need we had the short time we were there. Kandis is awesome to work with and met all our needs.

ownerResponse.text: Hello Sarah. We're grateful to know that your experience with us was an amazing one! We're always happy to hear appreciation from our customers. We look forward to seeing you again soon at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc..

google_reviews.author: Zach Welch
google_reviews.review: I don't have time to go into how much this company sucks. They treat their tenets like crap. They essentially have long term contracts with big property owners and no accountability because of it. If you have an option, I'm warning you, don't rent from them, or anyone who uses them to manage a property.

google_reviews.author: Chandler Hines
google_reviews.review:
Not sure what you have to do to get a call back, left several messages.

Only communication I get is when they want my 44$ every month

google_reviews.author: jo schoenecker
google_reviews.review: The property manager is prompt and professional in addressing tenant and landlord concerns  communicating clearly  and providing informative solutions to the satisfaction of both parties.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Jo for the wonderful review of Son-Rise Property Management, Inc.! We appreciate you taking time to leave your feedback and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

google_reviews.author: Sarah Matonis
google_reviews.review: This review is about Brittany. She is impossible to get a hold of by email or phone call, and the office was closed during business hours when I tried to just drop by

ownerResponse.text: Good morning Sarah: We do not have a Brittany in our office and believe that you have mistaken us with another company. Would you please remove your review as it does not pertain to Son-Rise Property Management.  Thank you for your kind attention to this matter!

google_reviews.author: Andrea Benson
google_reviews.review: My small family had a good experience with Son-Rise. Maintenance was usually prompt, and the employees were always polite and professional.

google_reviews.author: casey pratt
google_reviews.review: Bunch of turds. Kicked my girlfriend out of her apartment the she had lived in for 4 years with a 20 day notice in the middle of winter. Good business ethics I would say.

ownerResponse.text: We're extremely sorry that you had to face such difficulties. Issues in our customer service is not something we are known for. As you can see from our other reviews, we pride ourselves on providing great service and we'd like to do the same for you. We may not be able to change the past but if you give us a chance, we can work to make things right. Our team hopes to resolve this to your benefit and earn you back as a customer.

google_reviews.author: Tom Butler
google_reviews.review: Is great staff that takes care of their clients. They stay on top of safety requirements and the requirements and make the properties look great

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Tom for leaving us a 5* review.  We really appreciate the time that you took to let us know!  All the best, Son-Rise Property Management

google_reviews.author: sergej mijic
google_reviews.review: Without no doubt, best management company in Bellingham area. They always come through no matter what the problem is. Thank you son-rise!

google_reviews.author: Katarina Puchkarev
google_reviews.review: Great experience working with Rose and Rebeka! At this time, I am still in the process of working with PURE Property Management and getting things finalized for the place that I will be renting out at the end of the month. At this time, both Rose and Rebeka have been super helpful and a delight to work with. I am impressed with their communication and willingness to work with me as we get everything finalized and processed for the rental property. Rose has been very supportive and informative in my application process and same with Rebeka, and that has been a huge help in making sure all the items get actioned and completed in a timely manner as well as ensuring that my concerns and questions get answered and addressed prior to my partner and I moving in to the property.

google_reviews.author: Sydney Cole
google_reviews.review: Currently going through the leasing process and Pure could not be better! Rose who is one of the leasing specialists has answered all of our questions and has responded super quickly. 10/10 recommend!

google_reviews.author: Sara Saxton
google_reviews.review: I have been renting from PM for almost 4 years and they have been great. Kandis and Zerick are great. Best place I've rented from.

google_reviews.author: Sophia Faelan
google_reviews.review: Candice, Rose, Rebeka, Cindy, and Amber are so wonderful to work with!!! They are so kind and very helpful with all parts of the rental process and they try their best to make me feel safe and cared for as a tenant  which especially means a lot being autistic thank you so much!!!

google_reviews.review: Satisfied with the service, Karen Gaxiola, was very friendly from the first call, the maintenance person also thank you
